name: py-clikit
description:
CliKit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command
line interfaces.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pylev
dependencies.description: A pure Python Levenshtein implementation that's not freaking GPL'd.

dependencies.name: py-crashtest
dependencies.description:
Crashtest is a Python library that makes exceptions handling and
inspection easier.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-pystan
dependent_to.description: PyStan is a Python interface to Stan, a package for Bayesian inference.

dependent_to.name: py-cleo
dependent_to.description:
Cleo allows you to create beautiful and testable command-line
interfaces.

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.
